# fivethirtyeightdata

<!-- badges: start -->
[![Travis build status](https://travis-ci.com/fivethirtyeightdata/fivethirtyeightdata.svg?branch=master)](https://travis-ci.com/fivethirtyeightdata/fivethirtyeightdata)
<!-- badges: end -->

`fivethirtyeightdata` is an add-on R data package that contains the large datasets not found in the original `fivethirtyeight` package via a drat repository \url{https://github.com/fivethirtyeightdata/drat}, published by FiveThirtyEight \url{https://github.com/fivethirtyeight/data}.

## Installation

You can install the latest version from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("fivethirtyeightdata/fivethirtyeightdata")
```
